room_title: Escape room "The Cursed Tomb" by Escape Canton in Canton
room_description: You've arrived to join an archaeological expedition. When you come to the dig site, you discover an ancient abandoned Mayan tomb. Locals believe the tomb to be cursed, and the previous team of researchers who descended into the darkness of the tomb were never seen again. Can you escape in 30 minutes or will you succumb to the same fate?
